channel.title: Home on Gatekeeper
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Gatekeeper

item.title: Features
item.description: Keep your user accounts safe and central. Self-hosted, secure and under your control. Gatekeeper gives you a centralized identity management under your control. You have an idea for a new feature? We always look forward to new feature ideas and to understand your use-cases. Submit my idea Manage your users from one central place. Gatekeeper Directory Gatekeeper comes with a built-in user and group management.

item.title: Get involved
item.description: Help making Gatekeeper better! Gatekeeper is an open source project and developed collaboratively. Even if you're not a developer, you can get involved and make a difference. Development Contribute to Gatekeeper by fixing issues, improving functionality or implementing new features. View the source code Testing Let's make Gatekeeper bug-free by testing and filing bug reports.

item.title: Install
item.description: We are not quite ready yet... Gatekeeper is still under active development. We currently do not advise to run Gatekeeper in production as many of the features are not finished or hardened. If you're a developer and interested. You can however run the software locally. Official installation methods Source Build from source yourself
